text:
Hi to all! I think I’ve found a small bug in HubSpot CMS and I’m wondering how I can contribute to fixing it or add a bug report somewhere? Here are more details about the potential issue:
<https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/CSFGKSHT7/p1662370781763869?thread_ts=1655842822.833149&cid=CSFGKSHT7>
Thanks in advance.

how does everyone handle updating modules/sections after some code is added or edited? The existing modules or sections on the website don't get updated and you have to manually re-insert them. It's a minor thing but quite inconvenient..

<@U034X9K26MD> never mind. I figured out the problem after reading the source code of the HubSpot client. You can’t have both the oAuth bearer token and the hapikey query parameter in the request. The automation API works only with hapikey.
oh nice, glad it worked out
